pre_flight_parked.pilot: {FACILITY} Traffic, {CALLSIGN}, at {LOCATION}, pre-flight for departure to {DESTINATION}.

startup.pilot: {FACILITY} Traffic, {CALLSIGN}, at the ramp, starting engines for departure.

taxi_out.pilot: {FACILITY} Traffic, {CALLSIGN}, at {LOCATION}, taxiing to Runway {RUNWAY} via {TAXIWAY}.
{FACILITY} Traffic, {CALLSIGN}, taxiing to the run-up area for Runway {RUNWAY}.

depart.pilot: {FACILITY} Traffic, {CALLSIGN}, taking the active Runway {RUNWAY} for departure.
{FACILITY} Traffic, {CALLSIGN}, departing Runway {RUNWAY}, straight out departure.

climb_out.pilot: {FACILITY} Traffic, {CALLSIGN}, departing the pattern, climbing through {ALTITUDE}.

cruise.pilot: {FACILITY} Traffic, {CALLSIGN}, level at {ALTITUDE}, transiting the area.
{FACILITY} Traffic, {CALLSIGN}, {DISTANCE} miles {DIRECTION} of the field, level {ALTITUDE}.

approach.pilot: {FACILITY} Traffic, {CALLSIGN}, {DISTANCE} miles {DIRECTION}, entering left downwind for Runway {RUNWAY}.
{FACILITY} Traffic, {CALLSIGN}, descending through {ALTITUDE}, entering traffic pattern for {RUNWAY}.

final.pilot: {FACILITY} Traffic, {CALLSIGN}, on short final for Runway {RUNWAY}.
{FACILITY} Traffic, {CALLSIGN}, established on final, Runway {RUNWAY} full stop.

go_around.pilot: {FACILITY} Traffic, {CALLSIGN}, executing missed approach Runway {RUNWAY}, climbing.

braking.pilot: {FACILITY} Traffic, {CALLSIGN}, vacating Runway {RUNWAY}, taxiing to the ramp.

taxi_in.pilot: {FACILITY} Traffic, {CALLSIGN}, clear of the active, taxiing to the terminal.

holding.pilot: {FACILITY} Traffic, {CALLSIGN}, established in the holding pattern at {WAYPOINT}.

post_flight_parked.pilot: {FACILITY} Traffic, {CALLSIGN}, clear of all taxiways, engine shutdown.
{FACILITY} Traffic, {CALLSIGN}, safely parked at {GATE_NUMBER}, shutting down.
